named-native-query.name: Privilege.listPrivsByAppName
named-native-query.query: select * from usms_privileges p where p.id in (select po.priv_id from usms_privilege_operation po where po.oper_id in (select o.id from usms_operations o where o.application_id in (select a.id from usms_applications a where a.name= ?) and o.enabled = 1))

named-native-query.name: Privilege.listPrivsByUserId
named-native-query.query: select * from usms_privileges p where p.id in( select pr.priv_id from usms_privilege_role pr where pr.role_id in( select ur.role_id from usms_user_role ur where ur.user_id = ?) ) and p.enabled = 1

named-native-query.name: Privilege.hasPrivilege
named-native-query.query: select * from usms_privileges p where p.id in( select pr.priv_id from usms_privilege_role pr where pr.role_id in( select ur.role_id from usms_user_role ur where ur.user_id = ?) ) and p.enabled = 1 and p.name= ?

named-native-query.name: Privilege.listUsersByPrivName
named-native-query.query: select * from usms_users u where u.id in (select ur.user_id from usms_user_role ur where ur.role_id in (select r.id from usms_roles r where r.id in (select pr.role_id from usms_privilege_role pr where pr.priv_id in (select p.id from usms_privileges p where p.name = ?)) and r.enabled = 1)) and u.enabled = 1

named-native-query.name: Privilege.listTargetRoles
named-native-query.query: select * from usms_roles r where r.id in (select role_id from usms_privilege_role where priv_id =?) and enabled=1

named-native-query.name: Privilege.listSourceRoles
named-native-query.query: select * from usms_roles r where r.id not in (select role_id from usms_privilege_role where priv_id =?) and enabled=1
